title: Third Call with Alanna: Police Notification and Retaliatory Threats
summary: A recorded phone call where Ben Carter informs Alanna O'Hare that he has involved the police and her continued calls constitute a police matter. In response, Alanna confirms she has made a report to HMRC regarding alleged tax evasion as a direct result of the conflict, stating 'you push me to this'. She also denies having fully submitted a previous report, contradicting earlier evidence.

quotes.quote: I put that all in my report today... that it's been at least five or six years that you've been avoiding tax.
I didn't press Submit. and that why i was so shocked
you push me to this. With this all Police bullshit.
